Message.Title: Network subnet mask illegal
Message.Description: The subnet mask for network interface is illegal.
Message.Consequences: The network interface will not be configured, and may not be used.
Message.Causes: The network subnet mask may be mistyped.
Message.Actions: 1) Make sure the network subnet mask is correct.

Message.Title: Network interface IP address illegal
Message.Description: The network IP address for interface is illegal/missing.
Message.Consequences: The interface will not be configured, and may not be used.
Message.Causes: The network IP address may be mistyped or it already exists on the network.
Message.Actions: 1) Make sure the interface IP address is correct and not a duplicate.

Message.Title: Network gateway IP address illegal
Message.Description: The default gateway IP address is illegal/missing or the LAN IP address is illegal.
Message.Consequences: The network will not be reached, and may not be used.
Message.Causes: The gateway IP and/or LAN IP addresses may be mistyped.
Message.Actions: 1) Make sure the gateway IP and LAN IP addresses are correct.

Message.Title: No parameters from the DHCP server
Message.Description: The network interface has not received any parameters from the DHCP server.
Message.Consequences: The interface will not be configured, and may not be used.
Message.Causes: The LAN connection is not working -The DHCP server is not activated.
Message.Actions:
1) Make sure the LAN cable is working and correctly connected.
2) Make sure the DHCP server is activated.
3) Set the LAN IP address manually.

Message.Title: Network interface initialization error
Message.Description: The network interface could not be initialized.
Message.Consequences: The interface will not be configured, and may not be used.
Message.Causes:
The network parameters may be wrong.
-Although unlikely, the hardware may be faulty, requiring replacement.
Message.Actions:
1) Make sure the network parameters for the interface at hand are correct.
2) Isolate the cause, by replacing the suspected hardware.
